query_meta.sq:
SELECT SUM(OpBal) OpBal, SUM(CROPVAL) AS CROPVAL, SUM(BONUS_AMT) BONUS_AMT, SUM(INPUTVAL) INPUTVAL, SUM(AMTPAID) AMTPAID, SUM(ADJAMT) ADJAMT, SUM(CL_BAL) CL_BAL
FROM (
SELECT a1.region, a2.branchname AS branchid, a3.areaname AS AREA, a8.cspuid AS Month_Plan, a9.cropscheme, a10.subgroupid AS crop, 
a6.ragid, a6.agrno, a6.frmcropcycle, a5.npartyname AS farmerid, a7.villagename AS village, a11.employee_name AS FSName, a6.sowdt, a6.Sweekno AS weekno, a6.acressown AS acres,
0 AS OpBal, 
(SUM(CASE t1.mapname WHEN 'CPSAD1' THEN t1.debit ELSE 0 END)*-1)  AS CROPVAL, 0 AS BONUS_AMT, 
SUM(CASE SUBSTR(t1.mapname,1,3)WHEN 'inv' THEN t1.debit ELSE 0 END) +  
SUM(CASE t1.mapname WHEN 'ISCMR4' THEN t1.debit ELSE 0 END) AS INPUTVAL, 
SUM(CASE t1.mapname WHEN 'sainv1' THEN t1.debit ELSE 0 END) AS AMTPAID, 
SUM(CASE t1.mapname WHEN 'ftran1' THEN t1.debit ELSE 0 END) + 
SUM(CASE t1.mapname WHEN 'acvch1' THEN t1.debit ELSE 0 END) + 
SUM(CASE t1.mapname WHEN 'finse1' THEN t1.debit ELSE 0 END) + 
SUM(CASE t1.mapname WHEN 'finse3' THEN t1.debit ELSE 0 END) + 
SUM(CASE t1.mapname WHEN 'finse4' THEN t1.debit ELSE 0 END) AS ADJAMT, SUM(t1.debit*-1) AS CL_BAL, a6.cropcycleid, (a6.sowdt+a6.hardays) AS EDOH
FROM frmtrans t1, cropcycle a6, regiondetails a1, branchmast a2, amaster a3,  frmmast a5, vmaster a7, csp1 a8, cropmaster a9, igdetail a10, empmaster a11
WHERE t1.cropcycleid = a6.cropcycleid AND a1.regiondetailsid=a2.region AND a6.branchid=a2.branchmastid AND a6.areaname=a3.amasterid 
AND a6.farmerid=a5.frmmastid  AND a6.village = a7.vmasterid AND a6.cspuid = a8.csp1id AND a8.cropmasteruid = a9.cropmasterid 
AND a8.Crop = a10.IGDetailid AND a6.fieldstaff = a11.empmasterid 
AND a6.ragid = :ragid
GROUP BY a1.region, a2.branchname, a3.areaname, a8.cspuid, a9.cropscheme, a10.subgroupid, a6.ragid, a6.agrno, a6.frmcropcycle, 
a5.npartyname, a7.villagename, a11.employee_name, a6.sowdt, a6.Sweekno, a6.acressown, a6.cropcycleid, (a6.sowdt+a6.hardays)
UNION ALL
SELECT a1.region, a2.branchname AS branchid, a3.areaname AS AREA, a8.cspuid AS Month_Plan, a9.cropscheme, a10.subgroupid AS crop, 
a6.ragid, a6.agrno, a6.frmcropcycle, a5.npartyname AS farmerid, a7.villagename AS village, a11.employee_name AS FSName, a6.sowdt, a6.Sweekno AS weekno, a6.acressown AS acres,
0 AS OpBal, 
SUM(CASE t2.mapname WHEN 'cpsgr1' THEN t2.credit ELSE 0 END) + 
SUM(CASE t2.mapname WHEN 'cpsad3' THEN t2.credit ELSE 0 END) AS CROPVAL, 0 AS BONUS_AMT, 
SUM(CASE t2.mapname WHEN 'SalRt2' THEN (t2.credit*-1) ELSE 0 END) AS INPUTVAL, 
SUM(CASE t2.mapname WHEN 'payrt1' THEN (t2.credit*-1) ELSE 0 END) AS AMTPAID, 
SUM(CASE t2.mapname WHEN 'ftran2' THEN (t2.credit) ELSE 0 END*-1) + 
SUM(CASE t2.mapname WHEN 'acvch2' THEN (t2.credit) ELSE 0 END*-1) + 
SUM(CASE t2.mapname WHEN 'finse2' THEN t2.credit ELSE 0 END*-1) +
SUM(CASE t2.mapname WHEN 'finse5' THEN t2.credit ELSE 0 END*-1) AS ADJAMT, 
SUM(t2.credit) AS CL_BAL, a6.cropcycleid, (a6.sowdt+a6.hardays) AS EDOH 
FROM frmtrans2 t2, cropcycle a6, regiondetails a1, branchmast a2, amaster a3,  frmmast a5, vmaster a7, csp1 a8, cropmaster a9, igdetail a10, empmaster a11
WHERE t2.cropcycleid = a6.cropcycleid AND a1.regiondetailsid=a2.region AND a6.branchid=a2.branchmastid AND a6.areaname=a3.amasterid 
AND a6.farmerid=a5.frmmastid  AND a6.village = a7.vmasterid AND a6.cspuid = a8.csp1id AND a8.cropmasteruid = a9.cropmasterid 
AND a8.Crop = a10.igdetailid AND a6.fieldstaff = a11.empmasterid 
AND a6.ragid = :ragid
GROUP BY a1.region, a2.branchname, a3.areaname, a8.cspuid, a9.cropscheme, a10.subgroupid, a6.ragid, a6.agrno, a6.frmcropcycle, 
a5.npartyname, a7.villagename, a11.employee_name, a6.sowdt, a6.Sweekno, a6.acressown,a6.cropcycleid, (a6.sowdt+a6.hardays)
ORDER BY 7) a11
GROUP BY region, branchid, AREA, Month_Plan, cropscheme, crop, ragid, agrno, frmcropcycle, farmerid, village, FSName, sowdt, weekno, acres, cropcycleid, EDOH, ragid
ORDER BY 7

template: OpBal{{active.opbal}} INPUTVAL{{active.inputval}} CROPVAL{{active.cropval}} AMTPAID{{active.amtpaid}} ADJAMT{{active.adjamt}} BONUS AMT{{active.bonus_amt}} CL BAL{{active.cl_bal}}
